p: In this paper, we included 83 works published between 1981 and 2018 in English, collected from Sciencedirect, Springer and PubMed databases. To find these publications, we have used the following keywords: Hepatoprotective effect/activity, liver disease, plants and essential oils. Therefore, 23 articles based on experimental studies of some plant essential oils against hepato-toxicity actions were included in this review.
